Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PointPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PointPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnUpdateNeededListener, Serializable
public class PointPlayer extends Object implements Serializable, OnUpdateNeededListener
Class that represents the points achieved by a player.
Since:
10/04/2023
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • notifyOnPointUpdated

      public void notifyOnPointUpdated()
      Notifies the listeners of the point update by invoking the onPointsUpdated method on each listener. The updated point values, along with the player's nickname, are passed as parameters to the listeners.
      See Also:
      • onPointsUpdatedListeners
      • OnPointsUpdatedListener
